property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a player. That player shuffles all of their shields into their deck, then adds the same number of cards from the top of their deck into their shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Non-darkness creatures cost 2 more to summon.

property.name: Rules
Rules
Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Whenever you generate a cross gear, you may draw a card. ■ This creature can't attack players.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. {METAMORPH} (If you have 7 or more cards in your mana zone, this spell gets the following Metamorph ability.) {METAMORPH}: Instead of tapping one of your opponent's creatures, tap all your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, they can't choose the crossed creature. (It can still be attacked or blocked.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ACCELERATOR} (While this creature is crossed with a cross gear, this creature gets the following Accelerator ability.) This creature can't be blocked. When this creature would be destroyed, you may put a cross gear crossed with this creature into your graveyard instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} Cross one of your creatures in the battle zone with one of your cross gear for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ Whenever the crossed creature attacks, you may look at the top 4 cards of your deck. If you do, put one of them into your hand and put the other 3 cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {METAMORPH} (If you have 7 or more cards in your mana zone, this creature gets the following Metamorph ability.) {METAMORPH}: When this creature is destroyed, return up to 2 other creatures from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ Instead of attacking with the crossed creature, you may tap it to use this {TAP} ability: {TAP} Destroy all creatures that have power the same as or less than the crossed creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has less power than it.

card.name: Sharion, Hunter of the West Wind

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your cross gear each cost 1 less to generate or cross. They can't cost less than 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your graveyard. If it's a creature, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has less power than the revealed creature. If it's a cross gear, you may put it into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of your opponent's tapped creatures in the battle zone. Your opponent can't untap that creature at the start of his next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ During your turn, all your other creatures get +2000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Saver: Cross Gear (When one of your Cross Gear would be destroyed, you may destroy this creature instead.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a cross gear in the battle zone, they can't choose a cross gear crossed with this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this cross gear is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may generate it, and cross it with a creature for no cost.) ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ The crossed creature gets "blocker". ■ When the crossed creature is destroyed, you may cross this with one of your creatures for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may look at your opponent's hand and add a card from it to their shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When this creature is destroyed, you may cross all of your cross gear that were crossed with this creature with one of your other creatures for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this cross gear is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may generate it, and cross it with a creature for no cost.) ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ The crossed creature gets +5000 power and "blocker". ■ The crossed creature can't attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks, after the attack, destroy this creature/

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ACCELERATOR} (While this creature is crossed with a cross gear, this creature gets the following Accelerator ability.) When this creature is destroyed, your opponent discards 2 cards from their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this cross gear is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may generate it, and cross it with a creature for no cost.) ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ The crossed creature gets +1000 power for each tapped creature in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {POWER ATTACKER} +5000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.) {DOUBLE BREAKER}

card.name: Gyulcas, Sage of the East Wind

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a cross gear from your deck, show that cross gear to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this cross gear is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may generate it, and cross it with a creature for no cost.) ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ Whenever the crossed creature attacks, you may destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 3000 or less.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ One of your creatures in the battle zone gets +4000 power until the end of the turn.

property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have a 'Beinz Sayla, Guardian of Cleansing Light' in your graveyard, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

That creature gets -2000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.)

property.value: ■ Until the start of your next turn, your opponent can't put cards from their hand into their mana zone.

property.value: ■ Choose one of your opponent's cross gear and put it into its owner's graveyard. {METAMORPH} (If you have 7 or more cards in your mana zone, this spell gets the following Metamorph ability.) {METAMORPH}: Instead of one of your opponent's cross gear, choose 2 of your opponent's cross gears and put them in their owner's graveyard.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Splash Queens. Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} Choose a player. That player chooses 2 cards in their mana zone and returns them to their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ The crossed creature gets +2000 power and breaks one more shield. ■ Whenever the crossed creature attacks, choose up to 2 cards in your opponent's mana zone and put them into their graveyard.
